TopicTitle: Is there a Kerbal Konstructs for version 1.11.0

Articles.Content: i have been looking for a Kerbal Konstructs for version 1.11.0 but have been unsuccessful any support

Moved to Add-on Discussion, you'll get better answers there.

Have you tried the Mod thread itself?

22 minutes ago, stta said:

i have been looking for a Kerbal Konstructs for version 1.11.0 but have been unsuccessful any support

The latest version of Kerbal Constructs is 1.8.1.15 and it was for KSP 1.8.1. That said, this version of Kerbal Konstructs works  with KSP 1.11.0 quite well.
